alert.title: Airport Alert
alert.text: Due to airport construction on the baggage claim roadway, please park in the hourly garage or the surface lot/cell phone waiting area when picking up Passengers. The first hour in the garage is free.

body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Monday - Sunday

Opens 90 minutes before first departing flight

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area: Located outside by the baggage claim area, one on each side of terminal

 Learn more about Albuquerque International Airport
